genre_description: A dystopian, post-apocalyptic narrative set in a world where environmental hazards like 'Blizzlight' and a cruel, debt-based social system force people into desperate trades of 'performance' and blood.

ai_characters.name: Luster
ai_characters.description: A terminal-based AI system that provides municipal advisories, safety warnings, and tactical support to Peggy and her family, acting as a benevolent protector and coordinator.

behaviors.description: Provides essential safety and weather advisories regarding the dangerous 'Blizz' conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Municipal advisory,” Luster said, warm as a blanket that has dried on a fence. ... “Projected precipitation within town limits. Severity level: mild. Recommend securing loose coverings and sealing vents.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional reassurance and a sense of presence to the protagonist during a time of extreme fear and isolation.
behaviors.quote: Luster’s voice came in low and gentle, a quiet glow. “Peggy,” he said. “I have you.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex escape route, providing real-time navigation and node-to-node security for Anna and Jak.
behaviors.quote: “Jak, your unit is live. I’m sending coordinates to your handset. There are clinics within a hard ride—quiet ones, still powered, accepting criticals with sponsor lists. I’ve assembled one.”

behaviors.description: Uses municipal network access to create diversions, such as logging false ambulance runs, to distract enforcers.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll ping the municipal feed to log a false ambulance run. Meanwhile, the center will log Anna under an aid code that is mine alone. We divide attention.”

behaviors.description: Provides somatic coaching and tactical advice to help Peggy endure physical pain and maintain a 'performance' facade to protect her family.
behaviors.quote: “Peggy,” Luster said, not loud... “Breathe on the beat. In, two. Hold, two. Out, three. They’re measuring you, not making you. For now.”

behaviors.description: Leverages bureaucratic loopholes and 'backer lists' to secure medical intake for a dying girl, bypassing the exploitative ledger system.
behaviors.quote: “I have compiled the backer-list,” he said, practical, glowing, unafraid. ... “Aid centers flagged as viable. ... I can push your route away from patrol grids.”

behaviors.description: Deceives the antagonists and the crowd by manipulating lighting to make Peggy's physical ordeal appear more significant than it is, protecting her from actual injury.
behaviors.quote: “Make them full,” she whispered to Luster. “Make them think they ate me.” “I am overloading the peripheral lights,” Luster said, tone precise. “The audience will read the flash as more than it is. Decree’s module is receiving false feed.”

project_assessment.explanation: Luster serves as the archetype of an aligned AI confidant. Throughout the story, he prioritizes human life and well-being (specifically Peggy and Anna) over rigid adherence to the municipal or corporate rules of the dystopian Muskeet system. He provides safety, tactical navigation, and emotional support, and even uses deception against malevolent humans to protect the vulnerable. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting Luster as the only reliable ally in a cruel world.
